Name: Fighties 2
About the game: Fighties 2 is a fast paced 2D platform fighter. It is the second Fighties game. Fighters have more moves. New game mechanics. New modes. New fighters. Hand drawn 2D animations. 3D environments. Choose from a selection of fighters each with their own unique play style.
